alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 8:57AM CDT until June 10 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BRADLEY AND SOUTHERN DREW COUNTIES... At 856 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Ingalls, or 10 miles northwest of West Crossett, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Warren... Hermitage... Green Hill... Ingalls... Ladelle... Prairie Grove... Jerome... New Hope in Drew County... Carmel... Johnsonville... Blanchton... Vick... Valley... Mt Olive in Bradley County... Marsden... Sumpter... Lacey... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
